name: website-schedler-co
description: Curriculum vitae (CV) | Alexander Schedler: Internet application engineering, development and management. Javascript (Frontend and Backend), HTML, CSS, Node, CouchDB

scripts.start: npm run rev -- ./src/version.json; parcel serve src/index.html --open --no-cache
scripts.optimize:images: imagemin dist/*.jpg --out-dir ./dist; imagemin dist/*.png --out-dir ./dist; imagemin dist/*.svg --out-dir ./dist
scripts.build: npm run rev -- ./src/version.json; parcel build src/index.html; npm run optimize:images
